title: 4a hung up downloading last app from Motorola. All apps present, minus Motorola apps. How to stop?
content: Pixel 4a hung up on downloading last app from Motorola phone.  All apps already present, so assume it's trying to download a Motorola-related app?  Tried to reinitiate setup, but goes back to downloading last app ... Grinding away for over 12 hours
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
